steps.text: HPPut 300g plain flour, 6 large eggs, 600ml milk, 1 tbsp sunflower or vegetable oil and a pinch of salt into a bowl
HPSet aside for 60 mins to rest
HPSet a medium frying pan and carefully wipe it with some oiled kitchen paper
HPWhen hot, cook your pancake for 1 min on each side until golden, keeping them warm in a low oven as you go
HPServe with lemon edges and caster sugar, or your favourite filling. Once cold, you can layer the pancakes.
